name: Jigsaw Masterpieces : Masterpieces of World - Baroque -
detailed_description:
"Jigsaw Masterpieces : Masterpieces of World - Baroque -" is an additional puzzle pack for "Jigsaw Masterpieces".

PACK INFO:

Puzzle Count: 10 Puzzles

PACK CONTENTS:

  • Girl with a Pearl Earring / Johannes Vermeer
  • The Allegory of Faith / Johannes Vermeer
  • The Milkmaid / Johannes Vermeer
  • The Art of Painting / Johannes Vermeer
  • Supper at Emmaus / Caravaggio
  • The Surrender of Breda / Diego Velázquez
  • Abduction of Europa / Rembrandt van Rijn
  • The Storm on the Sea of Galilee / Rembrandt van Rijn
  • The Battle of the Amazons / Peter Paul Rubens
  • The Feast of Venus Verticordia / Peter Paul Rubens

short_description: "Jigsaw Masterpieces : Masterpieces of World - Baroque -" is an additional puzzle pack for "Jigsaw Masterpieces".

pc_requirements.minimum:
最低:
  • OS: Windows 7 64-bit or higher
  • プロセッサー: Core2 duo or higher
  • メモリー: 4 GB RAM
  • グラフィック: DirectX9.0 compatible
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • ストレージ: 400 MB 利用可能

mac_requirements.minimum:
最低:
  • OS: MacOS 10.12 or higher
  • プロセッサー: Core2 duo or higer
  • メモリー: 4 GB RAM
  • グラフィック: 256MB VRAM or higer
  • ストレージ: 400 MB 利用可能
